name: Organic Coconut Oil Shampoo
description: Natural shampoo made with organic coconut oil for healthy, shiny hair. Free from sulfates and parabens.
ingredients: Organic Coconut Oil, Aloe Vera, Essential Oils

name: Vegan Protein Powder
description: Plant-based protein powder from pea and hemp. Supports muscle recovery and overall health.
ingredients: Pea Protein, Hemp Protein, Natural Flavors

name: Eco-Friendly Bamboo Utensils
description: Eco-friendly bamboo utensils set including fork, spoon, and chopsticks. Sustainable and biodegradable.

name: Organic Quinoa Salad Kit
description: Ready-to-eat organic quinoa salad with fresh vegetables and herbs. Nutrient-rich and delicious.
ingredients: Organic Quinoa, Mixed Greens, Cherry Tomatoes, Cucumber, Olive Oil Dressing

name: Natural Beeswax Lip Balm
description: Moisturizing lip balm made with pure beeswax and essential oils. Protects and nourishes lips.

name: Sustainable Yoga Mat
description: Eco-friendly yoga mat made from natural rubber and cork. Non-slip and supportive.

name: HealthWise Organic Ground Coffee
description: Premium organic ground coffee beans for a rich, smooth brew. Fair trade and sustainably sourced.

name: Cruelty-free & vegan Sunscreen
description: Cruelty-free and vegan sunscreen with natural ingredients. Broad spectrum protection without harmful chemicals.

name: Natural Essential Oil Diffuser
description: Ultrasonic diffuser for essential oils. Creates a calming atmosphere with natural scents.
